# Model yield cereal

## Yield

```{r}

yield_cereal_wt_pea <- read_rds("models/wt_pea/yield_cereal_wt_pea.rds") %>% 
  mutate(n_iterations = map_dbl(mod.gmerf, ~.x$n.iteration)) %>% 
  filter(n_iterations < 200)

n_models <- length(unique(yield_cereal_wt_pea$.imp))


  
fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea <- fun_get_fitted_observed(yield_cereal_wt_pea, y= "yield_cereal")

summary_fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea <- fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea %>%
  group_by(id_obs) %>% 
  summarise(mean_fitted = mean(fitted), observed = unique(observed), .groups = "drop")


```


```{r}


(fitted_vs_obs_yield_cereal_wt_pea <- plot_fitted_vs_observed(fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea, summary_fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea, my_title = "Cereal's yield: fitted vs observed",lab_y = TeX("Fitted($t.ha^{-1}$)"), lab_x = TeX("Observed ($t.ha^{-1}$)"), size_text = 16))

variance_decomposition(fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea)


get_error(yield_cereal_wt_pea, y = "yield_cereal")

evaluate_error(summary_fitted_observed_cereal_wt_pea, fitted = "mean_fitted")


(plot_importance_yield_cereal_wt_pea <- plot_importance(yield_cereal_wt_pea, threshold = n_models, y= "yield_cereal", size_text = 16))


```

```{r}

ggsave(plot = fitted_vs_obs_yield_cereal_wt_pea,  filename = "figures/wt_pea/fitted_vs_obs_yield_cereal_wt_pea.png", dpi = 300, height = 18, width = 12,  unit = "cm")
ggsave(plot = plot_importance_yield_cereal_wt_pea,  filename = "figures/wt_pea/plot_importance_yield_cereal_wt_pea.png", dpi = 300, height = 18, width = 16,  unit = "cm")
# ggsave(plot = plot_importance_yield_cereal_wt_pea,  filename = "figures/wt_pea/plot_importance_yield_cereal_wt_pea.png", dpi = 300, height = 490, width = 400,  unit = "px")


```
